Steve O’Connor CV

Senior UX Designer with a thoughtful, user-first approach to crafting inclusive, intuitive digital services.

Experienced in accessible design (WCAG/ARIA), design systems, and cross-functional collaboration within Agile teams.

Skilled in prototyping, user research, journey mapping, and usability testing—with a grounding in interaction design, branding, and service design.

Committed to continuous learning, mentoring others, and creating work that genuinely improves people’s experience.

(Mar 2017 — Mar 2024, Cambridge, UK)
